mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_user INNER JOIN sys_user_role ON sys_user_role.user_id = sys_user.id INNER JOIN sys_role ON sys_user_role.role_id = sys_role.id WHERE sys_user.id = sys_user_role.user_id AND sys_role.id = sys_user_role.role_id AND sys_user.is_del='0' AND sys_role.id=#{roleId}
mapper.update: update sys_user set is_lock=1 where id=#{userId}

update sys_user u,sys_user_role r set u.username=#{userName},u.salt=#{salt},u.password=#{password},u.email=#{email},u.is_lock=#{isLock},u.comment=#{comment},r.role_id=#{roleId} where u.id=r.user_id and u.id=#{id}
update sys_user set password=#{password},email=#{email} where username=#{username}
